arc_stage: Stage 1 â€“ Desperation & doubt: feels rejected, frustrated, and believes she will never be good enough. No internship yet.
transcript:
March 15th, 2023

I hope this entry makes sense. I've been thinking about the conversation with Mario Long from Weaver, Erickson and Johnson today. He offered me a job on the spot after my internship, which was unexpected. I'm not sure if I'm overthinking it, but I keep replaying our discussion in my head. Social interaction is still challenging for me.

March 15th, 2023

I hope this entry makes sense. I've been thinking about the conversation with Mario Long from Weaver, Erickson and Johnson today.
He offered me a job on the spot after my internship, which was unexpected.
I'm not sure if I'm overthinking it, but I keep replaying our discussion in my head.
Social interaction is still challenging for me.

summary: The writer received an offer of employment from Mario Long after their internship, and they are re-examining the conversation to gauge their reactions. The writer acknowledges that social interactions can be difficult for them, suggesting a potential factor in their response to the job offer.
